summary:
- **Capital Raising Type**: Placement with attaching unlisted options  
- **Total Ordinary Shares to be Issued**: 610,857,302 at AUD 0.003 per share  
- **Unlisted Options Issued**:  
  - 90,166,668 options (exercise price AUD 0.006, expiry 20/8/2027)  
  - 103,420,317 options (exercise price AUD 0.006, expiry 20/8/2027)  
  - 111,841,666 options (exercise price AUD 0.006, expiry 20/8/2027)  
  - 15,000,000 financial advisor options (exercise price AUD 0.006, expiry 20/8/2027)  
- **Proposed Issue Date**: 26/6/2025  
- **Shareholder Approval Required**: Yes, for Tranche 2 shares and all options (approval sought by 15/8/2025)  
- **Purpose of Funds**: Advancing dual-asset strategy (acquisition of complementary minerals asset & growth of South Harz Potash Project)  

No material dilution or escrow restrictions noted.
